article.title: U.S. Commercial Service Success Stories
article.summary: Get links to exporter success stories.
article.content:
Success stories are stories about companies that are successfully exporting their products internationally. To assist you in locating stories that closely resemble your situation, we have broken the archive down into the service(s) that was used by the company and industry of the product(s) being exported.

A summary of the latest success stories have been included below:

Pneumatic Vacuum Elevator-The Department of Commerce’s International Trade Administration’s (ITA) Trade Agreements Compliance Program helped PVE overcome a trade barrier that threatened to exclude it from the Japanese market.

Navistar - The Department of Commerce’s International Trade Administration’s (ITA) helped Navistar secure market access so they can sell trucks in Chile.

Motorola Inc. - The Department of Commerce’s International Trade Administration’s (ITA) helped Illinois- based Motorola Inc. in 2009-10 ensure that China’s bidding process for the rollout of its 3G network would not discriminate against foreign participants, enabling Motorola to win a $310 million contract in China.​
article.seometadatadescription: Get links to exporter success stories.
article.seometadatakeyword: Navistar, Pneumatic Vacuum Elevator, Motorola, Exports, Trade Problems
